thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 04 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Wutong Holding To Buy Shanghai Technology Firm Via Cash, Share Issue

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wutong Holding To Buy Shanghai Technology Firm Via Cash, Share Issue

organizations.name: reuters) - wutong holding group co ltd

text:
March 4 (Reuters) - Wutong Holding Group Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT REVISES ASSET RESTRUCTURING PLAN, TO BUY SHANGHAI TECHNOLOGY FIRM WORTH UP TO 1 BILLION YUAN ($157.66 million) VIA CASH, SHARE ISSUE
* SAYS SHARE TRADE TO RESUME ON MARCH 5 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FS3bUS Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3428 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
